definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: She has also written dozens of articles and coauthored three textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 她還撰寫了數十篇文章並與人合著了三部教科書。

sentences.english: Later, Jerry joined me as a co-author of Google Guide.
sentences.chinese: 後拉Jerry加入了，成了谷歌指南的合著者。

sentences.english: Perhaps the sight will make Wang and his coauthors at least a little less unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 也許這至少能讓王小東及其合著者不那麼不高興。

sentences.english: K. Lasser's New Rules for Estate and Tax Planning.
sentences.chinese: 雷瑟的地產和稅務規劃新原則》一書的合著者。

sentences.english: Start with the three books he authored and the one he co-authored.
sentences.chinese: 他以三本自己的著作和一本合著做爲開始。

sentences.english: Two authors collaborated on this novel.
sentences.chinese: 兩位作者合著了這部小說。

sentences.english: The co-authors write that more studies are needed to be certain it's the anesthesia that's causing the problem.
sentences.chinese: 合著者說麻醉引起的問題需要更多的研究來確定。
最終他們同意將我列爲原作的合著者。

sentences.english: Do you or any of your co-authors have any conflict of interest?
sentences.chinese: 你或你的合著者有利益衝突？

sentences.english: A new U. S. -based co-author reshapes the content to be more U.
sentences.chinese: 一新美國基於合著者重新形成滿足更多中心美國。

sentences.english: The Certificate of Representative Publication of Co-authorship for "Ministry of Education College and University Teacher's Qualifications Examination …"
sentences.chinese: 教育部專科以上學校教師資格審查代表作合著人證明。

sentences.english: For example, you can write a query that retrieves the coauthored psychology books.
sentences.chinese: 例如，可以編寫一個查詢檢索合著的心理學書籍。

sentences.english: She has written, both as a co-author and solo, every single song on each of them.
sentences.chinese: 作爲合著者以及單獨著者寫下了這些歌。

definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
a series of books/a collection of books
my unworthy writing (humble expr.)/my worthless manuscript

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Da4 Bai3 ke1 Quan2 shu1 Chu1 ban3 she4
related.word: 中國大百科全書出版社

definition: to send (a manuscript) to the press
